ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the heart's contents are brought into the open,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the secrets of the hearts exposed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the secrets of the hearts are laid bare (and examined)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and all that is in the hearts is made public,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And all what lies in the breasts is opened –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that which is in the breasts shall be made known
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And what is in the breasts is made apparent?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and that which is in the breasts is brought out --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the secrets of the breasts are made known,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And the hearts' contents shall be brought into the open?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And there shall be brounht to light that which is in the breasts?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and what is [concealed] in the breasts is divulged,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And that which is (locked up) in (human) breasts is made manifest-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that which is in the breasts (of men) shall be made known.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and that which is in the chest is brought out,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the contents of the hearts are obtained.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that within the breasts is obtained,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [100:10]   and that which is in the breasts, the hearts, of disbelief or faith, is obtained, [when] it is revealed and examined,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And the secrets of the breasts) what is in the hearts of good and evil, miserliness and generosity (are made 769 known.
